trans-unit.source: An abstract base class that represents the factory for producing message encoders that can read messages from a stream and write them to a stream for various types of message encoding.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象基类，表示用于生成消息编码器的工厂，消息编码器可从流中读取消息和将消息写入流以进行多种类型的消息编码。

trans-unit.source: Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 编码是将消息转换为一个字节序列的过程。

trans-unit.source: Decoding is the reverse process.
trans-unit.target: 解码是反向过程。

trans-unit.source: Use this class if you want to implement a custom message encoder.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望实现自定义消息编码器，请使用此类。

trans-unit.source: To implement your own custom message encoder, you must provide custom implementations of the following three abstract base classes:
trans-unit.target: 若要实现自己的自定义消息编码器，必须提供以下三个抽象基类的自定义实现：

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.Encoder%2A> to return an instance of your custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder>.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.Encoder%2A> 以返回自定义 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Then wire up your custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory> to the binding element stack used to configure the service or client by overriding the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory%2A> method to return an instance of this factory.
trans-unit.target: 然后通过重写 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory> 方法返回此工厂的实例，将自定义 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory%2A> 连接到用于配置服务或客户端的绑定元素堆栈。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom encoders, see [Data Transfer and Serialization](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-transfer-and-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义编码器的详细信息，请参阅[数据传输和序列化](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-transfer-and-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to write a class that is derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory>:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何编写派生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory> 的类：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a message encoder that can be used to correlate messages in session-based exchanges.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个消息编码器，可用于关联基于会话的交换中的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder" /> that is used in session-based exchanges of messages.
trans-unit.target: 在基于会话的消息交换中使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder" />。

trans-unit.source: A session-based message encoder can keep track the individual messages that form part of a conversation that consists of all the messages exchanged between two endpoints that are part of a session.
trans-unit.target: 基于会话的消息编码器可以跟踪组成部分对话的各个消息，对话由参与会话的两个终结点之间交换的所有消息组成。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the message encoder that is produced by the factory.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，获取工厂生成的消息编码器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder" /> used by the factory.
trans-unit.target: 工厂使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.Encoder%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.Encoder%2A> 属性：

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the message version that is used by the encoders produced by the factory to encode messages.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，获取工厂生成用于编码消息的编码器所使用的消息版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" /> used by the factory.
trans-unit.target: 工厂使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: The message version can be set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion%2A> 属性设置消息版本。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> is limited to using certain versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing and is not extensible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 限制为使用特定版本的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing，并且不可扩展。

trans-unit.source: So if these versions are not to be used, this property should be overridden to return <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此如果不使用这些版本，应重写此属性以返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.MessageVersion%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.MessageVersion%2A> 属性：
